sealcam_prompt: Clean minimal process flow infographic showing a three-stage automation pipeline. Stage 1: 'Prospect Data' with LinkedIn icon. Stage 2: 'AI Engine' with chip icon. Stage 3: 'Personalized Video' with message icon. Horizontal flow with connecting arrows. Dark modern background, high tech aesthetic. No complex text, simple labels only.
text_content: The Personalization Engine:\nScrapes LinkedIn and website data.\nAI scripts a unique pitch for every lead.
